name: Ring of Shadows
data: It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration an average amount.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
You think that you could 'store' spell points within the ring.
You could probably also later 'recall' some of them.
You also feel you could concentrate on the ring for some reason.
You get the feeling that the more spell points you store in the ring,
the less efficient the storage process is.
